description:
Buy one at Lenovo - https://lon.tv/crha6 (compensated affiliate link) - Lenovo's new Thinkbook Plus Gen 5 hybrid has a detachable OLED 14" display that turns into an Android tablet! It's pricey but a neat concept. See more laptops : https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnItLi4_4nwCJ89-aXdkVtrL5 and tablets: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnIvxZqf_YoJK_z9ocuZCYfDE and subscribe! http://lon.tv/s

title: Android & Windows Hybrid! Lenovo Thinkbook Plus Gen 5 Hybrid Review
